All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class SystemEvent
extends BaseEvent

This is the class for events having to do with ChatSystems.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

getSystem

public ChatSystem getSystem()
Get the source of this event as a ChatSystem. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the source of this event as a ChatSystem.

getIdentity

public ChatIdentity getIdentity()
Get the argument of this event as a ChatIdentity. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the argument of this event as a ChatIdentity.
